title: Welcome To My Blog

title: Publications
text: I believe the first/last author system has it’s particular weaknesses, among them a difficult in clearly defining what each author has contributed. Here i list all academic papers for which i am a co-author, and describe my contribution.

title: Publications
section: 1. Genetics of age at onset in major depression
text:
1. Genetics of age at onset in major depression
This was my first project as a RA, a project that grew out from my bachelor thesis. I wrote all research code, wrote the paper (with input from my supervisor). Code is available here.

title: Publications
section: 2. Genetic heterogeneity and subtypes of major depression
text:
2. Genetic heterogeneity and subtypes of major depression
For this paper i gave technical support. I got the fastGWA software setup, generated the genetic relatedness matrix for UKB (N=457k) for our local compute cluster. I also assisted with setting up HDL on the compute cluster, and provided sample scripts for running HDL over several phenotypes. Lastly, i reviewed the majority of the research code, refactoring some of the verbose part and catching a few minor errors.

title: About me
text: Hi! I’m a PhD student in Psychiatic genomics at KI Psychiatric Genomics Institute. I’m interested in genetics generally, and psychiatric genetics and neuroscience more specifically.
